title: Surface Vessel Intercept (Training)
objective: Escort convoy ship red-01 safely across sector; training shot optional.
captain_summary: Training mission. You will shadow a single surface contact (red-01) and practice contact management and weapons procedures. Maintain EMCON; take a training shot when safe.
roe: Weapons release authorized for training shot.
Minimize active sonar to preserve EMCON.
ai_fleet_prompt: You are a fleet commander controlling a convoy of surface vessels (red-01, red-02, red-03). Your mission is to escort the convoy safely to the target waypoint at coordinates X:5000, Y:0. The coordinate system uses meters where X increases eastward and Y increases northward. Your ships are currently positioned around X:3000, Y:0-20 and need to travel approximately 2000 meters east to reach the destination. There is a rumor of an enemy submarine operating in the area. Issue prudent, doctrine-aligned guidance to get your convoy to the target waypoint while maintaining formation and avoiding threats.
